summary: Comprehensive testing of TODO application completed successfully. Backend API testing achieved 96.2% success rate with all core functionalities working. Frontend UI testing achieved 100% success rate with all user flows, authentication, task management, filtering, and sorting working perfectly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minimal - both status codes indicate authentication failure

passed_tests: User signup with email validation and password requirements (min 6 characters)
User signin with JWT token generation and storage
User logout with token cleanup
Protected route access control (dashboard requires authentication)
Create new task with title, description, and priority selection
View all tasks in dashboard with proper display
Edit task details (title, description, priority) via modal dialog
Delete task with confirmation
Mark task as complete/incomplete with visual feedback
Filter tasks by completion status (All, Completed, Incomplete) - server-side filtering working
Sort tasks by priority (High/Medium/Low) - server-side aggregation pipeline working
Sort tasks by date created - server-side sorting working
Task priority badges display correctly (High=red, Medium=yellow, Low=green)
Password encryption in database using bcrypt
JWT token authentication on all protected endpoints
Proper error handling and status codes
Duplicate email registration prevention
Invalid credentials handling
Context API state management (AuthContext and TaskContext)
Axios API integration
MVC structure implementation on backend
MongoDB aggregation pipeline for sorting
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
